sentences.english: Study on degradation of methyl orange wastewater by high voltage discharge;

sentences.chinese: 可变电容器的焊点与RG213同轴电缆编织的连接。

sentences.english: The effect of electrolyte on high frequency electrical property of wet tantalum capacitors was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了电解质对高频液体钽电容器电性能的影响。

sentences.english: It thus acts as a supercapacitor.
sentences.chinese: 因此它的作用相当于一个超级电容器。

sentences.english: Distribution capacitance between ground and resistance of a divider is the key factor that influences its performance.
sentences.chinese: 电阻分压器对地分布电容是影响其性能的关键因素。

sentences.english: This is an area where dynamics and condensers are used about equally.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个动圈麦和电容麦差不多都同被使用到的区域。

sentences.english: Having the excellent electrical performances, low losses and a capacitance of a slight variation with both temperature and frequency.
sentences.chinese: 电性能优良，损耗小，电容量随温度和频率变化小。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an energy saver for an AC contactor, which is composed of a starting part and a holding part.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种交流接触器电容型节能器。

sentences.english: Capacitor cores can be feed automatically and the lead wire will be skinned automatically, and the lenght can be set.
sentences.chinese: 电容芯子自动上料，引线自动剥皮，长度可以设定。

sentences.english: Small distributed capacitance and high resonance frequency.
sentences.chinese: 分布电容小，自共振频率高。

sentences.english: Assembling capacitor bank now is used widely in power system.
sentences.chinese: 集合式并联电容器已广泛用于电力系统。

sentences.english: In contrast, keeping the loaded capacitance constant the loaded inductances were tuned.
sentences.chinese: 反过来，保持加载电容不变，调节加载电感的参数。

sentences.english: The effect of aging voltage on the capacitance and leakage current of al electrolytic capacitors.
sentences.chinese: 老练电压对铝电解电容器容量和漏电流的影响。

sentences.english: Metallized film capacitors & filters, VDE, UL, TUV approved.
sentences.chinese: 金属化薄膜电容器&滤波器，有VDE等多项认证。

sentences.english: In this paper, the background of parasitic capacitance extraction of interconnects are briefly introduced.

sentences.english: It mostly analyse the design thought of the capacitance sensor.
sentences.chinese: 主要分析电容式传感器的设计思想。
